title: Mathieu van der Poel targeting two-for-one in Glasgow double rainbow worlds bid
content:
Dutch team also brings Van Baarle and Kooij, but all eyes will be on 'MVDP' and another showdown with Wout van Aert.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel targeting two-for-one in Glasgow double rainbow worlds bid on Velo.
